patthana4.4:1.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:4.1_0: Kusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:4.1_1: Kusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:4.1_2: Kusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo noāsavo ca abyākato noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:5.1_0: Akusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:6.1_0: Abyākataṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:7.1_0: Kusalaṁ noāsavañca abyākataṁ noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:8.1_0: Akusalaṁ noāsavañca abyākataṁ noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:9.1_0: Kusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana4.4:10.1_0: Akusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana4.4:11.1_0: Abyākataṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:12.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:14.1_0: Kusalo noāsavo dhammo kusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:15.1_0: Akusalo noāsavo dhammo akusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:16.1_0: Abyākato noāsavo dhammo abyākatassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:17.1_0: Kusalo noāsavo dhammo kusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:19.1_0: Kusalaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:20.1_0: Akusalaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:21.1_0: Abyākataṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:22.1_0: Kusalaṁ sāsavañca abyākataṁ sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:23.1_0: Akusalaṁ sāsavañca abyākataṁ sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:24.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:25.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… novigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:27.1_0: Kusalo sāsavo dhammo kusalassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:28.1_0: Akusalo sāsavo dhammo akusalassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:29.1_0: Abyākato sāsavo dhammo abyākatassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:30.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:32.1_0: Kusalaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:33.1_0: Abyākataṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:34.1_0: Hetuyā dve …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:36.1_0: Kusalo anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:37.1_0: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:38.1_0: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:38.1_1: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:39.1_0: Kusalo anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:40.1_0: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:40.1_1: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo kusalassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:41.1_0: Kusalo anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:42.1_0: Abyākato anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:44.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:45.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:47.1_0: Kusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:47.1_1: Kusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:47.1_2: Kusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto ca abyākato āsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:48.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:49.1_0: Abyākataṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:50.1_0: Kusalaṁ āsavavippayuttañca abyākataṁ āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:51.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavavippayuttañca abyākataṁ āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:52.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā satta …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:54.1_0: Kusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:55.1_0: Akusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:56.1_0: Abyākato āsavavippayutto dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:59.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:60.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:62.1_0: Kusalaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:63.1_0: Akusalaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:64.1_0: Abyākataṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:65.1_0: Kusalaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca abyākataṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:66.1_0: Akusalaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca abyākataṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo
patthana4.4:66.1_1: ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:67.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:69.1_0: Kusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo kusalassa sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:70.1_0: Akusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo akusalassa sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:71.1_0: Abyākato sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo abyākatassa sāsavassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:74.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana4.4:77.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:79.1_0: Kusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:80.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:81.1_0: Abyākataṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.4:83.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavañca abyākataṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:84.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:86.1_0: Kusalo āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:92.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.4:94.1_0: Kusalo āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:97.1_0: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:98.1_0: Kusalo āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.4:100.1_0: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo kusalassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:101.1_0: Kusalo āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:102.1_0: Abyākato āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo abyākatassa āsavavippayuttassa anāsavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:106.1_0: Akusalaṁ saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… akusalaṁ ganthaṁ … oghaṁ … yogaṁ … nīvaraṇaṁ ….
patthana4.4:107.1_0: Kusalaṁ noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
